column26: Deals 50 damage without backstab.  Cannot hit multiple targets in one stab.
Takes ~160ms to fire the 1st shot. Various methods of optimizing TTK: https://i.imgur.com/DLfa7hv.jpeg (qm = quick melee). TTK does not account for projectile travel time.

Takes ~640ms to charge a shot. Various methods of optimizing TTK: https://i.imgur.com/DLfa7hv.jpeg (qm = quick melee). TTK does not account for projectile travel time.  Damage increases from 60 to 120 (continuously) based on how long this weapon was charged.
Bullets are hitscan up until 40m, and then converted into a projectile afterwards.
TTK does not account for projectile travel time, or the initial delay when throwing the knives.  It represents more of a "time-to-death" calculation, if anything.
TTK does not account for projectile travel time, or the initial delay when throwing the knives.  It represents more of a "time-to-death" calculation, if anything.

Empty reload = 3.95s (1.65s for 1st shell, 0.9s for 2nd shell, then 0.7s for subsequent shells). Tactical reload = 0.95s for 1st shell, then 0.7s for subsequent shells.  Firing the weapon will cancel the reload animation.

Empty reload = 3.95s (1.65s for 1st shell, 0.9s for 2nd shell, then 0.7s for subsequent shells). Tactical reload = 0.95s for 1st shell, then 0.7s for subsequent shells.  Firing the weapon will cancel the reload animation.

LMB combo = 2x50 damage, then 2x60 damage, then 65 damage.  Can swap-cancel the combo when started.  Swap-cancel will not optimize TTK, but quick melee will. Deflecting bullets deals 100% damage to the enemy, and ~20% to you.

Arhythmic shell-by-shell reload.  Tactical reload has long "eject-and-catch-shell" animation before loading the 1st shell. Empty reload = 4.3s. Reload from 1 shell = 4.5s. Reload from 2 shells = 4.2s. Reload from 3 shells = 3.45s. Reload from 4 shells = 3.15s. Reload from from 5 shells = 2.4s. Firing the weapon will cancel the reload animation.
(need information about whether or not the fire DoT sticks to the player while dealing damage with Flamethrower ammo)

Empty reload = 5.55s (2.2s for 1st shell, 1.1s for 2nd then 3rd shell, 0.9s for 4th then 5th shell, then 1.35s for 6th shell).  Tactical reload from 1-4 shells = 1.35s for 1st shell, 0.9s for subsequent shells, then 0.65s for last shell.  Tactical reload from 5 shells = 1.1s.  Firing the weapon will cancel the reload animation.
Rounds detonate on impact after the 1st bounce. Maximum fuse time = 2.5s. Explosion inner radius = 1.5m.
Cannot hit multiple targets in one swing.
LMB combo = 65 damage, then 80 damage, then 90 damage.  Has a 3-4m range.
Damage is per hit in a 3-hit combo.  Has a 3m radius.
